channel.title: Girlfriendship
channel.desc: A booking mix-up turns Samara's birthday getaway into a week-long journey where she and her friends rediscover their passions, purpose and love lives.

channel.title: Sealed With A List
channel.desc: This holiday season, Carley sets out to conquer her list of abandoned resolutions from last year. Aided by co-worker Wyatt, she finds love and the confidence to chase her dreams.

channel.title: The Love Subscription
channel.desc: Businesswoman Lily must get over her differences with a love-focused company's CEO if she wants to turn his start-up into a thriving business.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Autumn at Apple Hill
channel.desc: Newly divorced Elise starts renovating the inn she inherited from her grandparents and catches the eye of Luke, the chief financial officer of a major hotel chain.
